executable.title: Simulate Acquisition Artifacts Using Prior (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and a mask, process the mask to match the image.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware. It was funded in part by USC:EXPOSE.

float.name: foreground
float.label: Foreground Intensity
float.description: Foreground intensity value, i.e., object value.

image.name: metricMask
image.label: Metric Mask
image.description: Points with non-zero values in this mask are used in match computations.

integer.name: erode
integer.label: Erosion Radius
integer.description: Radius to use for erosion to simulate tomosynthesis.

integer.name: dilate
integer.label: Dilation Radius
integer.description: Radius to use for dilation (after erosion) to simulate tomosynthesis.

float.name: gaussianBlur
float.label: Blur Sigma
float.description: Radius to use for blurring to simulate tomosynthesis.

float.name: samplingRate
float.label: Image Match Sampling Rate
float.description: Portion of voxels to use when computing image-match metric.

boolean.name: disableRegistrationOptimization
boolean.label: Disable Registration Optimization
boolean.description: Turn off the optimization of the registration of the prior to the image.

transform.name: loadTransform
transform.label: Load Transform
transform.description: Load the transform to be used instead of registration.

boolean.name: disableParameterOptimization
boolean.label: Disable Parameter Optimization
boolean.description: Turn off the optimization of the erode, dilate, blur parameters.

integer-vector.name: outputBoundary
integer-vector.label: Output Boundary Size
integer-vector.description: Size of boundary to be excluded from match computation and then cropped.

boolean.name: disableNormalize
boolean.label: Disable Normalization of Output Mask
boolean.description: Disable attempt to match mask intensity range with volume intensity range.

integer.name: seed
integer.label: Random Number Seed
integer.description: Seed for random processes in the method (0 = no seed).
